sentences: John Macaluso (born January 21, 1968) is an American drummer who has played for Ark, TNT, and Yngwie Malmsteen among others.
Born in Commack, New York, Macaluso started playing drums at age 11.
At the age of 18, he left his hometown for California to attend the Percussion Institute of Technology.
That same year, Macaluso was hired for his first tour as well as recording with guitarist Paul Hansen in Germany.
